performance_benchmarking: How does Fremont CA's dock efficiency today compare to Shanghai and Austin TX historically?

metadata.suggested_usage: Start with phase_1_basic_routing to validate single-agent routing, then progressively test more complex multi-agent scenarios through phase_5_showcase_questions
